title: Demand for return of fugitive Nawaz Sharif reached British Parliament: Dr. Babar Awan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 22 (APP):Adviser to Prime Minister on Parliamentary Affairs Dr Babar Awan on Tuesday said that the demand for the return of fugitive Nawaz Sharif reached the British Parliament.
In a tweet, he said that British MP Stephen Timms said Britain was bound to return Nawaz Sharif.
He said that Western public opinion is aware of Nawaz Sharifâ€™s corruption, adding that all avenues are closed for him except appearing before courts in Pakistan.
